Text:

@ rlf-rls any difference between your version and chris aksl's version?

Forgive my ignorance, but to which folder do I copy the files to?

never mind, I decided to go with a repack of teh game you can download here: http://thepiratebay.org/torrent/6445669/Dragon_Age_2_Complete_DLC_Re-Pack_(with_Patch_1.03)_-illiria

It includes all the DLC's cracked for 1.03.
